channel.title: Red Hat Trusted Software Supply-Chain Workshop
channel.description: Red Hat Trusted Software Supply-Chain Workshop

item.title: Integrating container signing into CI/CD pipelines
item.description: In the second exercise we'll sign a container image with Tekton Chains.
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)

item.title: Blocking unsigned container images with ACS
item.description: In the third exercise we'll block unsigned containers from OpenShift
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)

item.title: Detecting supply-chain compromise at runtime
item.description: In this exercise we'll identify anomalous behaviours in container applications at runtime, that could be indicative of supply-chain compromise.
item.author: sboulden@redhat.com (Red Hat)
